short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect lie and manipulation in youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension analyzes YouTube video transcripts to identify manipulations and lies using an LLM (Large Language Model) analysis. The extension provides an overlay on YouTube videos, showing detailed information about the statements made in the video.
